title: Promising test to detect parasites in farmed deer
desc: Test could give a fast, accurate and cost-effective way to detect infections earlier.

title: DNA marker reveals pyrethroid resistance in malaria mosquitoes
desc: A new study, jointly led by Liverpool School of Tropical Medicine and the Centre for Research in Infectious Diseases (CRID) in Cameroon, has detected a DNA marker in a gene encoding for a key enzyme, known as cytochrome P450, that helps mosquitoes to break down and survive exposure to pyrethroids, the main insecticides used for treating bed nets.

title: Probe on sprinter’s ‘forced’ SEA Games withdrawal nearly done
desc: The investigation report will be completed in two weeks and submitted to the Malaysia Athletics president and youth and sports minister.

title: AFL integrity unit looking into why police visited Melbourne Demons player Steven May
desc: Melbourne veteran Steven May is being investigated by the AFL integrity unit, as the premiership defender stays away from Demons training.

title: 2026 Official Sepang MotoGP Test: Day 3 - LIVE UPDATES
desc: Live updates from the third and final day of the Official 2026 Sepang MotoGP Test - Yamaha returns to action.

title: The sector with 17,000 more full-time jobs
desc: Unemployment has hit its highest level in a decade, but beneath the headline numbers some sectors are faring much better than others.

title: Budget limits cap DOST scholarships to 8,500
desc: Despite a surge in applicants nationwide, the Department of Science and Technology’s Science Education Institute (DOST Science Education Institute) will accept only 8,500 new undergraduate scholars this year, citing budget constraints.

title: COVID vaccination not linked to reduced childbirth
desc: COVID-19 vaccination is not the cause behind a decrease in childbirth, according to a study from Linköping University, Sweden.

title: Bambu Lab strengthens PH presence through media roundtable and new retail partnership
desc: Bambu Lab, a consumer technology company established in Shenzhen, China, in 2020, continues to bring 3D printing closer to everyday users by strengthening its...

title: Nutrition during cancer: Doctor busts food myths with medical facts
desc: As cancer care becomes more personalised, nutrition must follow the same path. Ms. Veena V’s message is clear: skip the fear-based food rules, nourish the body adequately, and trust evidence over trends because strength, not restriction, supports recovery.
